name: Dr. Rohit Garg
title: Director, MIT Moradabad
bio: Hi-Tech 2025, the annual technical fest of Moradabad Institute of Technology, serves as a vibrant platform for students to showcase their creativity, technical skills, and innovative ideas. Through events like Ideathon, Projectathon, and Codeathon, we aim to inspire problem-solving, teamwork, and hands-on learning beyond the classroom. Wishing you all a successful, enriching, and memorable experience at Hi-Tech 2025.
